name: Color Me Calm
desc: A colouring game where the user uploads a picture of their choice and colours a pixelated version of it using a grid system. Features include different difficulty to increase the dimensions of the grid, as well as the ability to click and hold to colours.

name: Blud
desc: A prototype multiplayer puzzle platformer created to show the negative effects of gang involvement.

name: Solitair 2.0
desc: A custom version with custom rules of solitaire created using Turing. Custom version includes an endless mode where it lets the user to continously play and earn points until they decides to end the game
